trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for handling an error that occurs during the execution of a workflow application.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別，處理在工作流程應用程式執行期間所發生的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class with a text string description of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的文字字串描述，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The information required to serialize or deserialize the application exception object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化應用程式例外狀況物件所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of a given serialized stream, and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 指定之序列化資料流的來源和目的端，和其他呼叫端定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class with the context and serialization information required to retrieve data about this exception from a serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用擷取自序列化資料流且與此例外狀況有關的資料時所需的內容和序列化資訊，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: An exception that has a causal relationship to the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 與應用程式例外狀況有因果關係的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class with a text string description of the exception and with an additional exception that is the cause of the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的文字字串描述和造成此應用程式例外狀況的其他例外狀況，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The application exception is thrown in response to the inner exception and can use information from the inner exception to handle the error more appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 已擲回應用程式例外狀況以回應內部例外狀況，且可以使用內部例外狀況的資訊以更適當地處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: A globally unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 全域唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class with a text string description of the exception and with a unique identifier for it.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的文字字串描述和其唯一識別碼，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A description of the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式例外狀況的描述。

trans-unit.source: A globally unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 全域唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: An exception that has a causal relationship to the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 與應用程式例外狀況有因果關係的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> class with a text string description of the exception, a unique identifier for it, and an additional exception that is the cause of the application exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的文字字串描述、其唯一識別碼和造成此應用程式例外狀況的其他例外狀況，建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The application exception is thrown in response to the inner exception and can use information from the inner exception to handle the error more appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 已擲回應用程式例外狀況以回應內部例外狀況，且可以使用內部例外狀況的資訊以更適當地處理錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The information required to serialize or deserialize the abort exception object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化中止例外狀況物件所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of a given serialized stream, and an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: 指定之序列化資料流的來源和目的端，和其他呼叫端定義的內容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用與例外狀況相關的資訊，設定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前例外狀況的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 唯一識別碼。
